name: Chess.io
description:
Chess is a two-player (AI avaiable) strategy board game played on a checkered board with 64 squares arranged in an 8×8 grid. The game is played by millions of people worldwide. You can also play this brilliant game with just few clicks of mouse.

NOTE: You can only play with AI, Which has very Very POWERFUL and SHARP mind. Beat it and gain the IQ of the legends

This is a chess game made by Avalynn for our school research project.

Enjoy Playing :)

This version has:

  • AI
  • change from white to black
  • AI vs AI

This version doesn't have:

  • check warning
